zh.title: 比特币/美元技术分析：震荡整理中，短期维持偏弱
zh.content:
目前比特币/美元价格维持在67061.4附近，较前一交易日出现小幅回落，24小时变化为-0.95%。尽管市场出现震荡整理，价格始终未突破前期高点67753.99，表现出短期内的上行压力。总体趋势偏向区间震荡，需关注关键支撑和阻力的突破。

技术指标方面，当前RSI数据缺失，无法进行准确的超买超卖分析。MACD显示为221.19508，虽然数值较为积极，但信号线缺失令其参考价值受限。SMA(20)为68222.18300，显示价格持续低于20日均线，表明市场暂时未能恢复上涨动力。此情形下，价格可能会维持在当前区间内波动。

支撑位方面，当前价格接近66855.6水平，这一价位为短期支撑线，若跌破此位置，则可能进一步向下回调至更低水平。上方阻力位在67753.99附近，这一高点未能突破，成为短期价格反弹的强阻力。突破该位置可能会引发新的上涨。

建议投资者保持谨慎，短期内避免激进操作。建议在66855.6附近寻找低吸机会，同时密切关注67753.99附近的压力。如果突破上方阻力，则可考虑逐步进场，但需注意市场的波动性。

en.title: Bitcoin vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The current price of Bitcoin (BTC) stands at $67,061.4, showing a slight decline of -0.95% in the past 24 hours. This suggests a short-term bearish sentiment in the market, though the range between the day's high of $67,753.99 and low of $66,855.6 indicates a period of consolidation. The price appears to be struggling to maintain upward momentum, with the market still within a narrow range. If this trend continues, Bitcoin may face difficulty breaking above the $68,000 resistance zone, possibly leading to a test of the lower support near $66,500.

Looking at the Relative Strength Index (RSI) and MACD, both indicators are currently unavailable, leaving a gap in momentum analysis. However, the absence of clear signals from these indicators means traders should remain cautious. With the price sitting just below the 20-day Simple Moving Average (SMA) at $68,222.18, Bitcoin is technically underperforming in the short-term. If the price fails to reclaim the SMA, it could signal further downside pressure. A close below the current low could open up the next support zone around $65,000.

From a support/resistance perspective, the $66,500 to $66,800 area serves as key support. A break below this level could see Bitcoin testing $65,000 or even $63,500. On the upside, the $68,000 level remains a strong resistance, and any move above this could suggest a shift towards bullish momentum. A confirmed break above this zone, coupled with improving momentum indicators, may signal a new upward trend toward $70,000 and beyond.

Given the current market conditions, traders may want to be cautious with long positions until Bitcoin demonstrates stronger bullish signals, such as a reclaim of the SMA and a positive shift in momentum. Short-term trades might benefit from range-bound strategies, looking to buy near support and sell at resistance. Always ensure proper risk management, as the market remains volatile.
